statements: UPDATE EmployeeProductivity SET time_spent_minutes = 60 WHERE employee_id = 1 AND task_id = 101
UPDATE EmployeeProductivity SET task_name = 'Coding Task', time_spent_minutes = 120 WHERE task_id = 102
UPDATE EmployeeProductivity SET time_spent_minutes = 60 WHERE employee_id = 100 AND task_id = 1;
UPDATE EmployeeProductivity SET task_name = 'Review' WHERE task_id = 2 AND time_spent_minutes < 30;
UPDATE employees SET tasks_completed = 10, total_hours_spent = 25.5 WHERE employee_id = 1;
UPDATE tasks SET hours_spent = 5.5, task_description = 'Updated Task Description' WHERE task_id = 3;
UPDATE employees SET tasks_completed = tasks_completed + 3, total_hours_spent = total_hours_spent + 10 WHERE employee_id = 101;
UPDATE tasks SET hours_spent = hours_spent + 5.5 WHERE task_id = 201;
UPDATE employees SET position = 'Manager' WHERE employee_id = 1;
UPDATE tasks SET actual_duration = 8, estimated_duration = 10 WHERE task_id = 3;
UPDATE employees SET department = 'HR', position = 'Manager' WHERE employee_id = 101;
UPDATE tasks SET actual_duration = 5, task_description = 'Updated task description' WHERE task_id = 201;
UPDATE employees SET department='HR' WHERE employee_id=1;
UPDATE tasks SET time_spent_minutes=120 WHERE task_id=3;
UPDATE employees SET employee_name = 'John Doe', department = 'Marketing' WHERE employee_id = 1;
UPDATE tasks SET task_description = 'New task description', time_spent_minutes = 120 WHERE task_id = 5;
